item.title: Team Dynamics -- Your Team, Other Teams, and the Company 'Team'
item.description: Checkouts: Mary: * Nesting with Grace * Setting priorities with the Yearning Hierarchy * Mary’s blogpost about setting priorities PJ: * CodeDaze.me - Sept 14-15, Buffalo, NY. A conference dedicated to code, design, development, and everything tech! * The Get Up Kids - Kicker Jason: * DieCutStickers.com * Quiet: The Power of Introverts in a World That Can’t Stop Talking - Susan Cain Greg: * Coderdojo * CascadiaJS 2018
